name: Error 771: Signal Lost
description:
For the Geta Game Jam

You are in complete isolation aboard an abandoned spaceship. You must fight off unknown anomalies trying to attack your ship!

Overview

Fend off anomalies by firing bullets and placing obstacles.

Controls
  • Q - Switch from room view and screen view
  • Left Click - Fire bullets when in screen view
  • Right Click - Place Obstacles when in screen view

Note: Main menu options not currently implemented.

Made by these lads!

Ethan(Shogun) - Programmer

AdassioSt - Musician

Danny - Programmer and Modeler
